We refer to Wikipedia articles on video production for help. When someone subscribes to a channel on YouTube, they will see a notification prompt appear on their screen asking them to allow notifications.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

The element that underscores the speaker's advice is option A: A red warning box stating that if you want to represent a business/organization or a public figure, you should create a Page instead of changing the account name.
